title: Master Thesis Openings
body:
There are several topics available for internships or master thesis projects at the Laboratory for Chemical Technology. Please contact me via e-mail for more information.
Available Topics Conformational Data Augmentation for Machine Learning-Based Molecular Property Predictions with Chemical Accuracy
Supervisors: prof. Kevin Van Geem and prof. Maarten Sabbe
Daily supervision: Maarten Dobbelaere
Uncertainty Quantification of Machine Learning Models for Chemical Engineering Systems
Supervisors: prof. Kevin Van Geem
Daily supervision: Maarten Dobbelaere
Machine Learning and Data Analysis for Solvent Selection in Batch and Flow
Supervisors: prof. Kevin Van Geem and prof. Chris Stevens
Daily supervision: Maarten Dobbelaere
